name: Boomer
description: The Boomer is a Medium Plant creature resembling an ordinary fungus when motionless. It has a muted coloration and lacks physical defense.
memorable: Its powerful sonic abilities can incapacitate and damage foes at an unexpected range, punishing enemies upon its defeat.
goals: To control the battlefield by incapacitating foes and alerting nearby creatures.
relations: It may be found in areas where other plants thrive or alongside creatures sensitive to sound.
environment: Often found in forested or overgrown regions, blending in with fungi.
strengths: Immune to thunder damage and has special abilities that can incapacitate multiple foes.
weaknesses: Extremely low physical stats make it vulnerable to direct attacks, and it cannot move.
attacks: Employs sonic-based attacks that can incapacitate and deal thunder damage.
most_powerful_ability: Deafening Boom, which incapacitates foes and can control the battlefield dynamics.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, detecting creatures without sight.
additional_information: Immobile with walking speed of 0 feet.
Mimics ordinary fungus for effective camouflage.
Reactionary ability to emit a loud shriek when disturbed.
test_queries: immobile creature that emits loud noises
monster that uses thunder damage abilities
